snippet.title: Whisper of the House - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: See how you can organize and arrange items and unlock hidden secrets in this Whisper of the House trailer. Whisper of the House is a 2D pixelate renovation puzzle game, driven by the narrative threads. Set in the seemingly cozy and harmonious small town, players follow the main characters through moving, organizing, and cleaning, while interacting with unique town residents. As players delve deeper, they will unintentionally influence residents’ life paths and gradually unveil their hidden secrets. Whisper of the House will be available in spring 2025 on PC.
